Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2008 11:53PM tampaphyllodes14 wrote: I just received diagjnosis of low grade phyllodes tumor.  Just learnedI will need to have a wider margin removed per review by tumor board. I did have an excission recently.  Would like to chat with other women diagnosed with phyllodes since this is so rare and what they have done and how they are doing after surgery.
